mapper.select: SELECT B.NNO, B.WRITER, B.TITLE, B.CONTENT, B.HIT, B.IP, B.NDATE, B.NLASTMODIFIED FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, A.NNO, A.WRITER, A.TITLE, A.CONTENT, A.HIT, A.IP, A.NDATE, A.NLASTMODIFIED FROM (SELECT NNO, WRITER, TITLE, CONTENT, HIT, IP, NDATE, NLASTMODIFIED FROM NOTICE ORDER BY NNO DESC) A) B WHERE B.RN BETWEEN #{beginRecord} AND #{endRecord}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE VALUES (NOTICE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, 0, #{ip}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
